## Cisco-IOS-XR-bundlemgr-oper.yang

- [XPaths Obsoleted](#xpaths-obsoleted)
- [XPaths Deprecated](#xpaths-deprecated)
- [XPaths Added](#xpaths-added)
- [XPaths Removed](#xpaths-removed)
- [XPaths Modified](#xpaths-modified)

### Description

[CSCwr06272]Updated schema type for member interface and iccp group id range for oper model.[CSCwo11658]interface-name inplace of interface-handle.[CSCvv55548]Removed event-telemetry annotation from leaf interface-name of grouping BM-MEMBER-DATA. [CSCvw90022]changed datatype of bandwidth leaf. [CSCwa05148]]Added a new enum entry for bm-mbr-state-reason.[CSCwc62198]Added a new enum entry for bm-mbr-state-reason. [CSCwd77233]Added a new enum entry for bm-bdl-state-type.
